pageContext.claim: “Well, I am, and I was responsible for getting the Olympics. The Olympics is coming to Los Angeles, and I was called by the mayor, and he said, could you do us a favor, when I was president-elect, and he said, could you do this? And I worked very hard, and we got the Olympics and we have the World Cup coming into the United States.”
pageContext.analysis: Bids for the summer olympics started in 2015 well before Trump was president. Trump may have positively impacted the World Cup bid, in part by assuaging FIFA's concerns about American travel restrictions.
